attributes.action: Show the documentary “Jesy Nelson: Odd One Out” in all teen age schools
attributes.additional_details: Too many young people suffer awful mental illnesses and often take their lives as a result of bullying. This documentary explores how deeply someone can be effected by what they say, and it needs to be shown to ensure that young people know what effect they could be having on a person.
attributes.background: Show this documentary in all secondary schools and colleges to show young adults the effect they can have through bullying whether it be online or in person. It might help them understand if it comes from someone they all recognise, for example Jesy Nelson herself.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

The educational materials used to teach school students is a matter for individual schools, not the Government or House of Commons.

You might like to sign the following petitions:

Stop Bullying in Schools by Training All Teachers to spot Bullying & Harassment
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560462

Fund a national awareness campaign for mental health in schools
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553711

Provide additional funding to schools for Y10-13 mental health support.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548678
